modName: Miraak Devour Dragon Soul Shout - Zii Los Dii Du
summary:
Miraak Devour Soul Shout - By Rossobud

This is my First mod so go easy on me....
descriptionHtml:
We have all faced Miraak (Or atleast those who have dragonborn dlc) and witnessed his power.
His tentacle sword, his Dragon Aspect shout, but most of all, when we taught it was all over, it
wasn\'t. \"Kruziikrel, zii los dii du!\" - Kruziikrel, your soul is mine to devour!
Miraak absorbed the soul of all three dragons circling the summit of Apocrypha in order to 
replenish his health. Miraak was the first dragonborn, but sided with the dragons, where he
learned the dov language. The shout itself is more dov language than a shout but if he was the 
first dragonborn/dovahkiin, and was under the influence of Hermaeus Mora for a long time, he is bound to
have a few tricks up his sleeve.

WARNING: THIS WILL REPLACE \'Animal Allegiance\'!!!!

And so to the mod, this mod adds the \'Shout\' Miraak used to Devour the souls of those poor
dragons. The only way it is to find the \'Animal Allegiance\' word walls. Here is a good video by Orcidia: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AG5MnC91QoI
Or
You can open command console and type \'help ziilos\'
                                                           \'help dii\'
                                                           \'help du\'
Use PgUp on keyboard to scroll up on the command console, keelp scrolling, you will find the WOOPs.
UPDATE: (Thanks stsr85)
About Words IDs
Always the first two digits is different.
The standards IDs is:
First Word (ziilos) \"xx000d64\"
Second Word (dii) \"xx000d6c\"
Third Word (du) \"xx000d6d\"
Like i say the XX is the different for everyone.Now if you type in the console to find the first Word ID (help ziilos) and the ID is (C3)000D64
then the other two words IDs is \"C3000D6C\" for second Word and \"C3000D6D\" for third 

This is the \'Animal Allegiance\' Shout, and I\'m sorry, It\'s the only shout I never use. But hey, you got to make some sacrifice because the Devour Soul shout is cool.
It dosent add to your health, creation kit wouldn\'t allow me to do that in a shout, so sorry about that...
So far I have only made it NORD compatible, but I will change that in the future. Female compatible
would sound weird as Miraak was a guy but let me know what you guys think! The Sound of your
character will sound the same as Miraak when you use the shout. The shout is very overpowered
so if you want me to increase the recharge time, let me know. It was made for dragons but
It can be used on other things aswell.

COMING SOON: Sounds for other races, An optional rar file containing all of the sounds Miraak makes when he shouts (fus ro dah, etc...) that can be installed so that you sound like him when you shout, If possible, a hand-held spell that launches tentacle pits like Miraaks Staff.

Installation

1. Drag the \'Data\' Folder into C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim

2. Click yes for everything.

3. Check in NexusModManager that it is ticked in your load order.

4. Start skyrim

5.Find the  \'Animal Allegiance\' word walls. Here is a good video by Orcidia: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AG5MnC91QoI
Or
You can open command console and type \'help ziilos\'
                                                           \'help dii\'
                                                           \'help du\'
Use PgUp on keyboard to scroll up on the command console, keelp scrolling, you will find the WOOPs.
About Words IDs
Always the first two digits is different.
The standards IDs is:
First Word (ziilos) \"xx000d64\"
Second Word (dii) \"xx000d6c\"
Third Word (du) \"xx000d6d\"
Like i say the XX is the different for everyone.Now if you type in the console to find the first Word ID (help ziilos) and the ID is (C3)000D64
then the other two words IDs is \"C3000D6C\" for second Word and \"C3000D6D\" for third 

And you\'re done! >:D
Please let me know if there is any bugs or problems and I will fix them ASAP :)
If you want to use this in your own mod tell me!

UPDATE 2.0: Added other races support, and fixed a bug that may have replaced the Fo Krah
 Diin Sound for Nords...

AND: I added an optional file. When installed it allows you to sound like Miraak...

When you use the full shout (hold the shout button) you sound like Miraak for the following:
Unrelenting Force
Fire Breath
Frost Breath
Whirlwind Sprint

These were the only shouts that were voiced properly in the BSA file so sorry if you were
 expecting more...

You can also install via Nexus Mod Manager :D

(If a more experienced modder could add the shout rather than replacing it, that would be
cool, tell me if you\'re using this though ;))

OTHER Mods in the Screenshots:
Medusa Drakul armors and Thanatos dragon by Zerofrost Satyr
Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles
Thermopylae by Author Set file to hidden
Aetherium Armor and Weapons Compilation by lautasantenni
author: Rossobud

files.name: ZiiLosDiiDu Shout 09_OCT_2013
files.changelogHtml: UPDATE**** 09/OCT/2013 Replaces Animal Allegiance instead of frost breath and returns frost breath to original for those who got the older version :D

Added other races support, and fixed a bug that may have replaced the Fo Krah Diin Sound for Nords AND I added an optional file:
When you use the full shout (hold the shout button) you sound like Miraak for the following:

Whirlwind Sprint

These were the only shouts that were voiced properly in the BSA file so sorry if you were
expecting more...

You can also install via Nexus Mod Manager :D
